name: ClassleSoft Text to Mp3 Converter 2.0

screenshots.caption: ClassleSoft Text to Mp3 converter screenshot 2
ClassleSoft Text to Mp3 converter settings

short_description: Classlesoft Text to Mp3 converter is another handy little tool from ClassleSoft.  Classlesoft Text to Mp3 converter enables you, easily Convert your Text files to Audio Mp3 files with a click of a button. You can able to make your very own audio books very easily. It has Simple interface and occupies less memory space. You can batch convert more than one text files. Using this time saving software, even large numbers of files can be handled with one click.You can adjust the volume, speed and pitch of the recording voice.  And more over its a FREEWARE from Classlesoft.  You can also use spoken audio files as background sounds on your Web site, in presentations or in personalized e-mails.
summary: Convert your text files in to audio books
